channel.title: Favorite query with custom parameters
channel.description:
It would be a handy feature to be able to bookmark queries and dashboards with pre-configured parameters. At the moment, clicking favourited queries/dashboards only loads the default parameter values.
Workaround is to bookmark the page with the parameters once they're configured in the URI.

item.title: Favorite query with custom parameters
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Very interesting idea. If someone in the community would like to take the lead on this, I’m happy to provide support / guidance around how to implement it. Specifically it would be interesting to focus on how this UX would differ from what we have today.

  • Would we continue to call these favourites?
  • How would we validate these links if a parameter is added / removed from the target query / dashboard?
  • Would favourites / bookmarks be shareable easily? Tied to group membership?

Lots of interesting directions it could go
